Title: Good Person, Investigate School
Descriptions: A report just came in from one of the schools — they were ambushed by bandits. No one’s sure who survived, but supplies may still be inside. It’s a dangerous area, and time is critical. You’ll need a vehicle to get there safely. Move quickly and be careful.
Goto the location. And try to help the survivors
You made it out — and brought back what was needed. Whatever happened there, at least someone did something. Thank you — here’s your reward.
ObjectiveText: Travel to School and locate Bandits
